transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, boliye.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aap boliye ji, main team group se bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji sir, pata hai, team ji se baat ho rahi meri. Haan, Agni ji bol rahe hain?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Are aapka tone change ho gaya aapka, bukhar vukhar ho gaya?
Customer: Kya ho gaya?
Executive: Bukhar vagera ho gaya kya aapko, tone ekdam change, ekdam.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi, ho sakta hai aise hi lag raha ho, morning ka time hai.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Nahi aapne actually na leads vagera consume nahi kiye isliye maine connect kiya hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kya pichle week mein bhi aapne koi buylead consume nahi ki?
Customer: Nahi ki, aisa kyun?
Customer: Haan, main thoda camp fair mein busy hu na, abhi bhi camp chal raha hai, abhi medical camp.
Customer: Aur jaake.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To maine phir bhi. Mobile mein, mobile mein application nahi hai kya, Rahul ji?
Executive: Haan, mobile mein application hi hai, main mobile pe hi karta hu kyunki wo tab mein aur laptop mein wo slow hota hai. Mobile pe hi karta hu.
Executive: To shayad 10-12 se jyada mujhe notification bhi aa chuke hain mail pe lekin usko subscribe is tarike mein call vagera nahi kar paya hu, aaj se hi karunga sab aaj pura khatam ho jayega to free jaunga.
Executive: Main batati hu aapne last kab lead li thi. Aapne last smiley lead li thi 28 tarikh ko, do lead li thi. Nahi jyada li thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek, do, teen, char, panch, chhe lead li thi aapne 28 tarikh ko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai, uske baad aapne nahi li hai lead kyunki aapka jo weekly wala bonus hota hai na sir wo to waste hi ho jata hai na phir.
Customer: Maine kal pichle mahine chhe ko liya tha.
Executive: Sir, every week lena tha na, jaise agar aap busy bhi hain, camp vagera mein ya kisi mein bhi, to aapko hafte ki kam se kam teen leads to consume karni padegi jisse ki aap yahan par inactive show na ho hame.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Aisa rehta hai. Hmm. Aap chaho to abhi apne mobile mein khol sakte ho application ek baar. Aapka bhi camp kahan chal raha hai?
Customer: Abhi?
Executive: Hmm, camp kis jagah chal raha hai?
Customer: Abhi camp hospital ke bahar chal raha hai, school mein chal raha hai abhi ye.
Executive: Achha, matlab usi city mein wahi hai na?
Customer: Haan, city wahi hai. School mein chal raha hai abhi to abhi shayad ek ghante ke baad main buylead ko open kar paunga aur aapko main contact karunga.
Executive: Ek ghante baad matlab wahan bachchon ke test vagera ho rahe hain kya?
Customer: Haan haan haan, wahi hota hai, unka health checkup ko humko government deta hai na, unko weight vagera sab check karke vaccination ye sab hota hai na school mein.
Executive: Achha, aap government doctor hain kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achha. To matlab kis cheez ke hain, homeopathic ke ayurvedic ke hain?
Customer: Isme main to homeopathic gynecologist hu main.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Lekin hum to jada jada wahan par hum jate hain. Thoda ek ghante mein jab free ho jaunga, ek ghante patla ho jayega aisa. Main aapko call, main wo buylead consume karunga.
Executive: Wife vagera bhi doctor hain kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Achha, to jaise aapke jaise aap busy ho to us jagah pe wo nahi kar sakte hain consume vagera leads vagera?
Customer: Haan, wo to unko main sikha dunga, jaise kaam chalega wo to wahi karegi. Achha achha. Sambhalegi usko, wahi sambhalegi.
Executive: Kyunki yahan pe raw incense incense stick. Uski lead to aayi hai aapko. Uttar Pradesh mein bhi call kiya hai na sab aapka puch ke aise rakh dete hain koi deal aage nahi badhata. Ye bolne ki aise specially bol rahe hain ki humne price janne janne ke liye inquiry dala tha, aise hi bol rahe hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achha. Price janne ke liye agar dalenge.
Customer: Haan. Thoda sa ek baar catalog ek baar review kar lenge ki kahan dikkat aa rahi hai. Jisse ki leads vagera better aane lage.
Executive: Aur kuch category add kar denge, jaise abhi humne sirf saat category add kari hai na. Aur category add kar denge. Usme cow dung cake to hai, cow dung manure bhi to hai.
Executive: To aap main aapko phir 11:30 pe connect karu?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Main khud yahan se dekh ke aapko connect karunga main.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not consumed leads recently.

- Customer is busy with a medical camp.

- Leads are not converting into deals.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of weekly lead consumption.

- Executive suggested reviewing the catalog.

- Executive suggested adding more categories.

- Executive will call back at 11:30 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 11:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, medical camp, catalog review
